title: ISic000694. I.Sicily inscription 000694
body:
Facsimile Images

((·)) d(is) ((·)) m(anibus) ((·))
Asinia Char-
mosyne ((·)) v(ixit) ((·)) a(nnis) ((·))
LXV ((·)) mens(ibus) ((·)) ((·)) VII ((·))
5M(arcus) Allianus
fil(ius) fec(it)

Apparatus criticus

Text: Manganaro 1989, with comparison to Fasolo 2013, fig 59 photo

English translation

To the shades of the underworld, Asinia Charmosyne lived for 65 years and 7 months. Marcus Allianus, her son, built this.

commentary
